data.title: New Zealand Tour of India T20 Series 2026 - 3rd T20I
data.pubDate: Ticket listings for New Zealand Tour of India T20 Series 2026 - 3rd T20I at ACA Stadium in Guwahati, Assam on 01/25/2026

data.title: Serve Robotics Acquires Hospital Assistant Robot Company
data.description: The acquisition of Diligent Robotics marks the first expansion of Serve’s autonomy platform from sidewalks to indoor environments.

data.title: VoiceRun Raises $5.5M for Full-Stack Voice AI Platform
data.description: The startup positions its AI agent development platform as meeting rising transparency and reliability standards.

data.title: Enterprises Should Prioritize Governance Amid Agentic AI Boom
data.description: Executives from Accenture and Okta warned that the rapid adoption of autonomous AI agents is outpacing governance strategies.

data.title: AI Startups Merge to Launch First Full-Stack AI Cloud
data.description: Lightning AI and Voltage Park are joining up to bring together AI software and GPUs into a single stack.

data.title: Anthropic Aims for Transparency With Claude Constitution
data.description: The updated document addresses enterprises' need to understand AI systems and how they think -- a critical factor for using them in applications that could lead to unpredictable situations.

data.title: Humans& Raises $480M to Build Human-Centric AI Tools
data.description: Just three months old, the startup is already valued at $4.48 billion and has garnered attention from Google, Nvidia and Jeff Bezos.

data.title: OpenAI Targets Monetization, $1.4T Commitments by 2034
data.description: With the company investing massive amounts in infrastructure, prompting scrutiny of its finances, increased use of its products is a clear focus.

data.title: OpenAI Expands Cheap ChatGPT Tier; Ads Coming Soon
data.description: OpenAI is evolving ChatGPT as it looks for ways to boost revenue while ensuring ad-free options for premium users.

data.title: OpenAI, ServiceNow Enter Into Strategic Multiyear Partnership
data.description: The partnership reflects OpenAI's broader strategy to establish itself in the enterprise IT market by collaborating with major providers, while embedding its technology in their products without direct sales.

data.title: Wikipedia Parent Announces AI Deal with Amazon, Meta, Perplexity
data.description: Under the deal, tech vendors are paying to access Wikimedia's data to train and develop their large language models.

data.title: How AI is Reducing the Administrative Burden in Sales
data.description: Sales teams are using generative AI to reduce the time they spend on administrative tasks, enabling sales associates to focus on their core responsibilities.

data.title: Gemini Can Scour Apps to Deliver 'Personal Intelligence'
data.description: The new feature works across Gmail, Photos, YouTube and Search to answer a user's questions.

data.title: Cerebras Poses an Alternative to Nvidia With $10B OpenAI Deal
data.description: The agreement gives Cerebras a chance to show if its highly touted wafer-scale engine can successfully drive giant AI models better than Nvidia's chips.

data.title: AI Startup That Builds a Brain for Robots Valued at $14 Billion
data.description: Skild AI's latest funding round will help it scale its omni-bodied AI model, which is being developed with the aim of controlling any robot for any task.

data.title: Humanoid Robot Actuator Market Could Approach $10B by 2031
data.description: Increased deployment of humanoid robots across sectors is causing a boom in actuator demand.

data.title: Tech Giants, Thomson Reuters Form Alliance to Advance Trust in AI
data.description: The Trust in AI Alliance aims to advance AI systems through collaboration, transparency and actionable solutions.

data.title: Phenom's Acquisition: AI, Automation and the Future of Work
data.description: Amid concerns about AI-driven job losses, Phenom CEO Mahe Bayireddi emphasizes that AI is augmenting jobs rather than fully automating them, creating new opportunities in various sectors.

data.title: Salesforce Recasts Slackbot as a Personal AI Agent for Work
data.description: The update aims to make AI technology part of a collection of existing tools rather than another burden for employees.

data.title: Arm Launches Physical AI Unit
data.description: The company also divided its operations into Edge AI and Cloud AI segments, as focus on embodied AI ramps up.

data.title: Anthropic Introduces Claude Cowork
data.description: The general purpose agent is intended as a more accessible version of the company's Claude Code.

data.title: Meta Launches Meta Compute to Build out AI Architecture
data.description: The company committed a mammoth $72 billion to AI infrastructure in its 2025 fiscal year alone. It's not done yet.

data.title: Google's Universal Commerce Protocol Drives AI Shopping
data.description: The protocol is designed to help merchants stay up to date with changes in search, but it also requires merchants to be accessible within sites like Walmart and Shopify and for the information to be accurate.

data.title: Apple to Overhaul AI Efforts, Siri With Google Gemini
data.description: The iPhone maker opts to partner with the tech giant to revamp its AI systems rather than doing it on its own or with OpenAI.

data.title: OpenAI, SoftBank Invest $1B in SB Energy as AI Buildout Continues
data.description: Each company will invest $500 million in a move that builds on the Stargate initiative unveiled last year.

data.title: Meta Signs Deals With Nuclear Energy Companies
data.description: The agreements could enhance Meta's public image regarding its leadership in the AI race and its ability to secure energy sources to power its AI data centers.

data.title: Infosys, AWS Partner on Enterprise AI
data.description: Infosys will integrate Topaz AI with Amazon Q and Bedrock to boost generative AI use for clients in key industries and workflows.

data.title: Siemens Unveils Tech Pipeline to Accelerate Industrial AI
data.description: The product releases come amid a tight partnership with AI giant Nvidia and increasing interest in using new AI technology in manufacturing.

data.title: Synopsys Targets Automotive With AI, Software Push at CES
data.description: The company touted offerings and collaborations aimed at keeping costs down, reducing complexity and accelerating development times.

data.title: Google Updates Gmail With Suite of AI Tools
data.description: While the features can streamline specific tasks, they also require users to remain vigilant about the content generated by AI.

data.title: Hyundai Reveals AI Robotics Roadmap at CES
data.description: The company's vision included humanoid robots, key partnerships and advanced automation goals.

data.title: Boston Dynamics Unveils Humanoid Robot Atlas at CES
data.description: The company also announced a partnership with Google DeepMind to bring more cognitive capabilities to its robots.

data.title: Mobileye to Acquire Mentee Robotics in $900M Deal
data.description: The deal aims to support development of physical AI across the fields of autonomous driving and humanoid robotics.

data.title: Another $20B in Funding for Musk's xAI, Despite Grok Controversy
data.description: Backed by major investors, xAI aims to continue to rapidly scale its compute infrastructure and buildout of GPU clusters.

data.title: Nvidia's AI Driving Tech to Debut in Mercedes CLA in 2026
data.description: The automaker will be the first to utilize Alpamayo, a new family of open source models created to tackle long-tail autonomous driving challenges.

data.title: Nvidia Launches Physical AI Models for Robots
data.description: The AI giant also unveiled simulation frameworks and edge computing hardware.

data.title: AMD Competes With Intel With New AI Chips
data.description: The microprocessor vendor still has much to do in terms of getting its chips adopted by PC companies.

data.title: HP's New Keyboard Gives New Meaning to All-in-One
data.description: The new keyboard highlights a shift in the way people work and also shows how vendors are trying to control the desktop experience.

data.title: Nvidia Intros Six New AI Chips and New Open Models
data.description: Both the new chips and models demonstrate how Nvidia is innovating within the AI market, while also highlighting for customers the challenge of avoiding dependency on the vendor.

data.title: 10 AI Predictions for 2026
data.description: AI Business spoke to industry experts about their AI and robotics predictions for the next year.

data.title: When AI-Powered Humanoid Robots Make Bad Choices
data.description: When large language models hallucinate, they deliver incorrect statistics or problematic advice. But when LLMs are controlling humanoid robots, the problems they create could be worse.

data.title: The Shift Toward AI Data Quality as a Core Product
data.description: The integration of generative AI is making data more important, leading to a better understanding of workflows and a need to make better use of data centers.

data.title: Opinion: Work With – Not Against – Shadow AI
data.description: Shadow AI creates an increased risk of data leaks and compliance issues. Like shadow IT, admins should work with employees to find a solution.

data.title: New York Signs off on AI Safety Legislation
data.description: The RAISE Act sets AI safety rules to be enacted Jan. 1 2027, and pushes against Trump's recent executive order to get rid of "excessive state regulation."

data.title: x402 Aims to Enable Agentic Payments With Digital Dollars
data.description: The x402 protocol allows digital agents to use stablecoins so that they can pay for data and products autonomously, moving beyond traditional payment methods.

data.title: AI Coding Startup Lovable Now Valued at $6.6B
data.description: Lovable, a Swedish AI startup, raised $330 million in a Series B funding round. Its platform enables app creation via text prompts.

data.title: University Researchers Debut Tiny Programmable Robots
data.description: The swimming microbots can autonomously sense and navigate their surroundings, using temperature detection to monitor cell health.

data.title: Salesforce Buys Qualified in Agentic Marketing Push
data.description: It's the CRM provider's latest move to build out its Agentforce platform.

data.title: Anthropic Launches Skills Open Standard for Claude
data.description: This evolution could grant AI agents greater autonomy to perform tasks independently.

data.title: Google Releases Gemini 3 Flash Aimed at Enterprises
data.description: The move is part of Google's strategy to meet diverse enterprise needs while simplifying model selection for users.

data.title: OpenAI Updates ChatGPT Images Tool
data.description: OpenAI's GPT Image 1.5 focuses on boosting precision, speed and creativity.

data.title: All India Inter-School Sports Championship 2026
data.pubDate: All India Inter-School Sports Championship 2026 Future Champions Start Here A Mega Multi-Sport School-Level Event After the huge success of the Telangana Inter-School Sports Championship 2025...

data.description: Backed by major investors, xAI aims to continue to rapidly scale its compute infrastructure and buildout of GPU clusters.

data.title: Nvidia's AI Driving Tech to Debut in Mercedes CLA in 2026
data.description: The automaker will be the first to utilize Alpamayo, a new family of open source models created to tackle long-tail autonomous driving challenges.

data.title: Nvidia Launches Physical AI Models for Robots
data.description: The AI giant also unveiled simulation frameworks and edge computing hardware.

data.title: AMD Competes With Intel With New AI Chips
data.description: The microprocessor vendor still has much to do in terms of getting its chips adopted by PC companies.

data.title: HP's New Keyboard Gives New Meaning to All-in-One
data.description: The new keyboard highlights a shift in the way people work and also shows how vendors are trying to control the desktop experience.

data.title: Nvidia Intros Six New AI Chips and New Open Models
data.description: Both the new chips and models demonstrate how Nvidia is innovating within the AI market, while also highlighting for customers the challenge of avoiding dependency on the vendor.

data.title: 10 AI Predictions for 2026
data.description: AI Business spoke to industry experts about their AI and robotics predictions for the next year.

data.title: When AI-Powered Humanoid Robots Make Bad Choices
data.description: When large language models hallucinate, they deliver incorrect statistics or problematic advice. But when LLMs are controlling humanoid robots, the problems they create could be worse.

data.title: The Shift Toward AI Data Quality as a Core Product
data.description: The integration of generative AI is making data more important, leading to a better understanding of workflows and a need to make better use of data centers.

data.title: Opinion: Work With – Not Against – Shadow AI
data.description: Shadow AI creates an increased risk of data leaks and compliance issues. Like shadow IT, admins should work with employees to find a solution.

data.title: New York Signs off on AI Safety Legislation
data.description: The RAISE Act sets AI safety rules to be enacted Jan. 1 2027, and pushes against Trump's recent executive order to get rid of "excessive state regulation."

data.title: x402 Aims to Enable Agentic Payments With Digital Dollars
data.description: The x402 protocol allows digital agents to use stablecoins so that they can pay for data and products autonomously, moving beyond traditional payment methods.

data.title: AI Coding Startup Lovable Now Valued at $6.6B
data.description: Lovable, a Swedish AI startup, raised $330 million in a Series B funding round. Its platform enables app creation via text prompts.

data.title: University Researchers Debut Tiny Programmable Robots
data.description: The swimming microbots can autonomously sense and navigate their surroundings, using temperature detection to monitor cell health.

data.title: Salesforce Buys Qualified in Agentic Marketing Push
data.description: It's the CRM provider's latest move to build out its Agentforce platform.

data.title: All India Inter-School Sports Championship 2026
data.pubDate: All India Inter-School Sports Championship 2026 Future Champions Start Here A Mega Multi-Sport School-Level Event After the huge success of the Telangana Inter-School Sports Championship 2025...

data.title: ServiceNow and Anthropic Disclose AI Deal
data.description: With the partnership, Anthropic moves deeper into the enterprise AI market.

data.title: Apple Acquires Israeli Startup Q.AI
data.description: While financial details were not disclosed, the deal is being characterized as Apple's "second largest acquisition in history."

data.title: Google DeepMind Introduces Agentic Vision to Gemini 3 Flash
data.description: The new capabilities combine visual reasoning with Python code to improve image analysis and enable active investigations.

data.title: Google's AI-Powered Chrome Further Transforms Search
data.description: Similar to Anthropic's computer use tool and OpenAI's Atlas, the new AI features reflect the shift from the regular search format to one infused with AI agents.

data.title: Mistral AI Upgrades Vibe Coding Agent
data.description: The update is a step forward as the company underscores its position as a European challenger to dominant U.S. players in AI-assisted software development.

data.title: UK Watchdog Pushes for Google AI Opt-Out
data.description: As sites see reduced clicks due to Google's AI summaries, calls are mounting for renewed regulation.

data.title: OpenMind Unveils Robot App Store
data.description: The company said its platform will improve robot operators' access to software and support robotics adoption.

data.title: Nvidia Introduces New AI Weather Forecast Models
data.description: The models come as part of the company's Earth-2 platform, pitched as the first fully open AI weather software stack.

data.title: Google Launches Low-Cost AI Plus Subscription in the U.S.
data.description: The plan was previously available in select territories around the world but is now being rolled out to an additional 35 countries.

data.title: Robotics in 2026: Building the Business Case for Humanoids
data.description: From household deployments to general-purpose machines, experts weigh in on what the next year holds for the robotics industry.

data.title: Navigating the Next Phase of GenAI: Predictions for 2026
data.description: This year, enterprises will increasingly use and refine how they apply AI technology, balancing cost management with maximizing AI effectiveness.

data.title: Ai2 Releases Open Coding Agents Family
data.description: The release shows how enterprises need to balance cost with performance and highlights a rising trend in the open source model market.

data.title: Startup Plans to Use AI to Optimize How AI Chips Are Made
data.description: Two former-Google researchers launched Ricursive Intelligence in December. The company is already valued at $4 billion.

data.title: Debate Rages Over AI Bubble vs. Boom
data.description: As spending on AI infrastructure reaches new heights, questions persist about the long-term viability of data center investments and whether OpenAI can meet its lofty expectations.

data.title: Microsoft Aims for Better Inference Efficiency With Maia 200
data.description: As enterprises increasingly deploy AI agents that perform multi-step tasks, the chip addresses the need for more performance, cost efficiency, and energy savings in inference.

data.title: Nvidia Invests $2B in CoreWeave, Expands Partnership
data.description: The vendors expanded their partnership, boosting CoreWeave's standing in the AI infrastructure market.

data.title: Meta Pauses Teen Access to its AI Chatbot Characters
data.description: The move comes amid growing concern about interactions between chatbots and teenagers.

data.title: Microsoft Launches Vision-Language-Action Model for Robots
data.description: Designed to improve robots’ reasoning capabilities, Rho-alpha marks Microsoft’s offering in the growing field of physical AI.

data.title: Serve Robotics Acquires Hospital Assistant Robot Company
data.description: The acquisition of Diligent Robotics marks the first expansion of Serve’s autonomy platform from sidewalks to indoor environments.

data.title: VoiceRun Raises $5.5M for Full-Stack Voice AI Platform
data.description: The startup positions its AI agent development platform as meeting rising transparency and reliability standards.

data.title: Enterprises Should Prioritize Governance Amid Agentic AI Boom
data.description: Executives from Accenture and Okta warned that the rapid adoption of autonomous AI agents is outpacing governance strategies.

data.title: AI Startups Merge to Launch First Full-Stack AI Cloud
data.description: Lightning AI and Voltage Park are joining up to bring together AI software and GPUs into a single stack.

data.title: Anthropic Aims for Transparency With Claude Constitution
data.description: The updated document addresses enterprises' need to understand AI systems and how they think -- a critical factor for using them in applications that could lead to unpredictable situations.

data.title: Humans& Raises $480M to Build Human-Centric AI Tools
data.description: Just three months old, the startup is already valued at $4.48 billion and has garnered attention from Google, Nvidia and Jeff Bezos.

data.title: OpenAI Targets Monetization, $1.4T Commitments by 2034
data.description: With the company investing massive amounts in infrastructure, prompting scrutiny of its finances, increased use of its products is a clear focus.

data.title: OpenAI Expands Cheap ChatGPT Tier; Ads Coming Soon
data.description: OpenAI is evolving ChatGPT as it looks for ways to boost revenue while ensuring ad-free options for premium users.

data.title: OpenAI, ServiceNow Enter Into Strategic Multiyear Partnership
data.description: The partnership reflects OpenAI's broader strategy to establish itself in the enterprise IT market by collaborating with major providers, while embedding its technology in their products without direct sales.

data.title: Wikipedia Parent Announces AI Deal with Amazon, Meta, Perplexity
data.description: Under the deal, tech vendors are paying to access Wikimedia's data to train and develop their large language models.

data.title: How AI is Reducing the Administrative Burden in Sales
data.description: Sales teams are using generative AI to reduce the time they spend on administrative tasks, enabling sales associates to focus on their core responsibilities.

data.title: Gemini Can Scour Apps to Deliver 'Personal Intelligence'
data.description: The new feature works across Gmail, Photos, YouTube and Search to answer a user's questions.

data.title: Cerebras Poses an Alternative to Nvidia With $10B OpenAI Deal
data.description: The agreement gives Cerebras a chance to show if its highly touted wafer-scale engine can successfully drive giant AI models better than Nvidia's chips.

data.title: AI Startup That Builds a Brain for Robots Valued at $14 Billion
data.description: Skild AI's latest funding round will help it scale its omni-bodied AI model, which is being developed with the aim of controlling any robot for any task.

data.title: Humanoid Robot Actuator Market Could Approach $10B by 2031
data.description: Increased deployment of humanoid robots across sectors is causing a boom in actuator demand.

data.title: Tech Giants, Thomson Reuters Form Alliance to Advance Trust in AI
data.description: The Trust in AI Alliance aims to advance AI systems through collaboration, transparency and actionable solutions.

data.title: Phenom's Acquisition: AI, Automation and the Future of Work
data.description: Amid concerns about AI-driven job losses, Phenom CEO Mahe Bayireddi emphasizes that AI is augmenting jobs rather than fully automating them, creating new opportunities in various sectors.

data.title: Salesforce Recasts Slackbot as a Personal AI Agent for Work
data.description: The update aims to make AI technology part of a collection of existing tools rather than another burden for employees.

data.title: Arm Launches Physical AI Unit
data.description: The company also divided its operations into Edge AI and Cloud AI segments, as focus on embodied AI ramps up.

data.title: Anthropic Introduces Claude Cowork
data.description: The general purpose agent is intended as a more accessible version of the company's Claude Code.

data.title: Meta Launches Meta Compute to Build out AI Architecture
data.description: The company committed a mammoth $72 billion to AI infrastructure in its 2025 fiscal year alone. It's not done yet.

data.title: Google's Universal Commerce Protocol Drives AI Shopping
data.description: The protocol is designed to help merchants stay up to date with changes in search, but it also requires merchants to be accessible within sites like Walmart and Shopify and for the information to be accurate.

data.title: Apple to Overhaul AI Efforts, Siri With Google Gemini
data.description: The iPhone maker opts to partner with the tech giant to revamp its AI systems rather than doing it on its own or with OpenAI.

data.title: OpenAI, SoftBank Invest $1B in SB Energy as AI Buildout Continues
data.description: Each company will invest $500 million in a move that builds on the Stargate initiative unveiled last year.

data.title: Meta Signs Deals With Nuclear Energy Companies
data.description: The agreements could enhance Meta's public image regarding its leadership in the AI race and its ability to secure energy sources to power its AI data centers.

data.title: Infosys, AWS Partner on Enterprise AI
data.description: Infosys will integrate Topaz AI with Amazon Q and Bedrock to boost generative AI use for clients in key industries and workflows.

data.title: Siemens Unveils Tech Pipeline to Accelerate Industrial AI
data.description: The product releases come amid a tight partnership with AI giant Nvidia and increasing interest in using new AI technology in manufacturing.

data.title: Synopsys Targets Automotive With AI, Software Push at CES
data.description: The company touted offerings and collaborations aimed at keeping costs down, reducing complexity and accelerating development times.

data.title: Google Updates Gmail With Suite of AI Tools
data.description: While the features can streamline specific tasks, they also require users to remain vigilant about the content generated by AI.

data.title: Hyundai Reveals AI Robotics Roadmap at CES
data.description: The company's vision included humanoid robots, key partnerships and advanced automation goals.

data.title: Boston Dynamics Unveils Humanoid Robot Atlas at CES
data.description: The company also announced a partnership with Google DeepMind to bring more cognitive capabilities to its robots.

data.title: Mobileye to Acquire Mentee Robotics in $900M Deal
data.description: The deal aims to support development of physical AI across the fields of autonomous driving and humanoid robotics.
